    Student Information

    Secure student data management and enrollment systemsLearn More >

    PowerSchool SIS

    Comprehensive Student Information System for securely managing student data, attendance, and grades across K-12 schools.

    Enrollment

    A solution simplifying student enrollment and registration processes for schools and districts.

    Enrollment Express

    Streamline digital forms and workflows to make enrollment processes faster and easier.

    Ecollect Forms

    Customizable forms for gathering data from students, parents, and staff.

    Special Programs

    A tool for managing IEPs, 504 plans, and other specialized student programs with compliance tracking.

    Predictive Enrollment Analytics

    Enrollment forecasting to assist in resource planning.

    Personalized Learning

    Lesson planning, learning management, and assessmentLearn More >

    Schoology Learning

    A leading Learning Management System (LMS) supporting curriculum delivery and collaboration between teachers, students, and parents.

    Performance Matters

    A leading assessment platform to deliver and grade assessments and analyze student performance and growth.

    Curriculum & Instruction

    Build, manage, and analyze standards-aligned curriculum maps and lesson plans.

    ContentNav

    Manage, organize, and access a complete library of high-quality, district-approved content tagged to standards and common metadata.

    Student Success

    Attendance, behavior, and academic intervention managementLearn More >

    MTSS

    A single solution allowing educators to identify and track student needs, communicate with stakeholders, and monitor progress from one location.

    Attendance Intervention

    Tools to monitor and improve student attendance and reduce chronic absenteeism.

    Behavior Support

    Solution to manage and track student behaviors and foster a positive learning environment.

    College, Career & Life Readiness

    College planning, career exploration, & life skills developmentLearn More >

    Naviance

    A comprehensive platform for college, career, and life readiness, empowering students to explore and plan for their futures.

    Tools to streamline the hiring process, from application to onboarding.

    Employee Records

    Digital record-keeping for employee information and compliance.

    SmartFind Express

    A substitute management system ensuring staff coverage.

    Perform

    Performance evaluation tools for teachers and staff.

    Professional Learning

    Flexible, online platform simplifying professional learning management, tracking progress, and inspiring educator growth.

    Coaching & Mentoring

    Streamline your coaching process and boost teacher retention with our AI-powered platform.

    Resource Planning

    Budgeting, payroll, and resource management for district operationsLearn More >

    Allovue Allocate

    K-12 budgeting software that streamlines funding plans, tracks spending, and optimizes resources.

    Allovue Manage

    K-12 financial workflows to simplify spending management for school leaders, enabling real-time tracking and adjustments.

    Allovue Budget Suite

    Comprehensive K-12 budgeting tools to allocate, manage, and track school and district funds effectively.

    Atrieve

    A workforce management solution for payroll, HR, and operations.

    BusinessPlus

    A financial management platform for school districts.

    eFinancePlus

    Tools for managing school district finances and payroll efficiently.

    Data, Analytics & Insights

    Analytics, data visualization, and embedded toolsLearn More >

    Student Analytics

    Analytics tools for a complete picture of your schools, classrooms, and students.

    Risk Analysis

    Early warning system using predictive analytics to identify students at-risk of missing graduation.

    Student Readiness Analytics

    Insights to track student preparedness for college and careers.

    Talent Analytics

    360-degree views of staff learning, staff needs, and data analysis to support recruitment and retention strategies.

    Continuous Improvement Plans

    Tools to help you create, track, and collaborate on school improvement plans.

    Connected Intelligence

    Data-as-a-Service to transform how schools collect, store, manage, and utilize data to improve educational outcomes while ensuring AI readiness.

    MTSS

    A single solution allowing educators to identify and track student needs, communicate with stakeholders, and monitor progress from one location.

    Communication

    Secure messaging, alerts, and a centralized portal for stakeholdersLearn More >

    MyPowerHub

    A centralized hub for school and district updates, collaboration, and stakeholder engagement.

    Communicate

    Messaging solutions for school-to-home communication.

    SecureFile

    Secure document sharing for schools and parents.

    SafeArrival

    A tool for managing student attendance notifications.

    Presence

    Website and content management solutions for your school.

    Artificial Intelligence

    AI-powered tools and assistant for everyone in educationLearn More >

    PowerBuddy for Assessment

    AI tools within Performance Matters to help educators quickly create and manage personalized, high-quality assessments for students.

    PowerBuddy for College & Career

    AI assistant within Naviance that provides personalized support to students, simplifying career exploration and postsecondary planning.

    PowerBuddy for Community

    AI assistant deployed on districts' public websites to answer questions instantly, improving stakeholder engagement.

    PowerBuddy for Data Analysis

    AI assistant to democratize data analysis by enabling educators to explore and visualize data using natural language.

    PowerBuddy for Engagement

    AI assistant for MyPowerHub providing instant, accurate answers to parents' common questions, saving time and strengthening school and home communications.

    PowerBuddy for Learning

    AI-driven assistance within Schoology Learning to support creating and delivery quality learning experiences and personalized student support.

General Terms of Use

PLEASE READ THROUGH THE GENERAL TERMS OF USE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE SITE

This public website (www.powerschool.com) or any PowerSchool Product (excluding our Publicly Accessible Products as mentioned on our public website or Global privacy statement), hereinafter collectively referred as Site is brought to you (User) by PowerSchool Group LLC (PowerSchool) References to us, we, our, or PowerSchool in these Terms of Use, are referring to PowerSchool Group LLC and its affiliates. References to you, your or User in this General Terms of Use document are referring to the end user (student, parents, teachers, admin staff, or other user type that is accessing the PowerSchool Product, or a visitor to the public website) unless mentioned specifically. References to Customer in this Terms of Use document are referring to the respective School or School District who have licensed any PowerSchool Product (excluding our Publicly Accessible Products) and the User is connected to in capacity as a student, parent, teacher, admin or a member of staff.

Your use of this Site is subject to all terms and policies posted on this Site (including the Global Privacy Statement, collectively referred to as Terms of Use or ToU). This ToU informs you the rules for using the Site. This general ToU is a general agreement between PowerSchool, licensor of the product/ service and the User who avail any services from PowerSchool. IF YOU ARE UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE, PLEASE BE SURE TO READ THESE TERMS OF USE AND GLOBAL PRIVACY STATEMENT WITH YOUR PARENTS OR GUARDIAN AND ASK QUESTIONS ABOUT THINGS YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND.

The Terms of Use may be revised from time to time through an updated posting, and therefore you should check the Terms of Use periodically. Revisions are effective upon posting and your continued use of this Site following the posting of revisions to the Terms of Use will indicate your acceptance of such revisions.

It is important to us that this Site provides a helpful and reliable experience to Users. To protect our rights and yours, we have prepared these Terms of Use that apply to all Users of this Site. If you have any questions concerning the Terms of Use, pleaseContact Us.

BY USING THIS SITE, YOU REPRESENT THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTOOD THESE TERMS OF USE AND THE PRIVACY STATEMENT AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THEM. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ANY PART OF THESE TERMS OF USE OR THE PRIVACY STATEMENT GOVERNING THIS SITE, YOU SHOULD NOT USE THIS SITE. BY USING OR DOWNLOADING INFORMATION FROM THIS SITE, YOU AGREE TO USE OUR SERVICES IN A MANNER CONSISTENT WITH ALL APPLICABLE LAWS AND REGULATIONS AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THESE TERMS OF USE AND ANY APPLICABLE LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH YOUR EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION AND POWERSCHOOL.

A. Applicable for PowerSchool Products

This section and section B apply to all Users of PowerSchool product(s).

Access and Security

Access to sections of any PowerSchool product or service may be restricted based on the assigned role the User has per their school or school district, or the type of application to which the User has access. Usernames and passwords are personal to the registered User and may not be shared or transferred with any other party. Usernames and passwords must be kept confidential. You are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your username and password. You agree to (a) immediately notify your school or districts authorized administrator of any unauthorized use of your username and password, or another User’s username and password, or any other breach of security, and (b) ensure that you log out from use of this site under your username and password at the end of each session.

Registration

PowerSchool products may require you to be a registered User. At the time of registration and thereafter at all the times you agree to provide accurate, true and up-to-date and complete information. We reserve the right for the Customer to terminate your access to the Site if information you have submitted is inaccurate or becomes inaccurate at a later date. If required by the Customer, PowerSchool may assist in such access termination.

Information Accuracy

The User of a PowerSchool product licensed to a school or school district has an obligation to provide true and correct information and at all times keep the data up to date, wherever applicable. PowerSchool cannot guarantee the accuracy of information provided by the Users and therefore cannot be held responsible for any incorrect information of the User presented in the PowerSchool product. The information, software, products, and services published on this website may include inaccuracies or typographical errors. PowerSchool cannot be held responsible for complete information or flow not appearing due to faults in certain software, applications, or devices you may be using.

Content

PowerSchool does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information or content posted by the User or the Customer i.e. the School or School District. You agree that you must evaluate, and bear all risks associated with, the use of any content, including any reliance on the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of such content.

Submissions and Posting

You are responsible for your own communications, if any, and are responsible for the consequences of posting your data/ communications. You must not, and by using this site you agree not to, do the following things:

  1. post material that is copyrighted, unless you are the copyright owner or have the permission of the copyright owner to post it; post material that reveals trade secrets, unless you own them or have the permission of the owner;
  2. post material that infringes on any other intellectual property rights of others or on the privacy or publicity rights of others;
  3. post material that is obscene, defamatory, threatening, harassing, abusive, hateful, or embarrassing to another user or any other person or entity;
  4. post a sexually explicit image or statement;
  5. post advertisements or solicitations of business, post chain letters or pyramid schemes;
  6. impersonate another person; or
  7. post material that contains viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots or other computer programming routines or engines that are intended to damage, detrimentally interfere with, surreptitiously intercept or expropriate any system, data or information.
  8. your postings will not be used to carry out or solicit any unlawful activity and/or be used to make commercial solicitations.

Retention policy

Any personal data (like name, email id, demographic data, educational data, etc.) provided by the User in the application is retained for as long as you maintain an active account in the application, or for as long as you do not modify or delete the data. When you delete your account within the application, all personally identifiable data associated with your account is permanently removed.

Please note that certain aggregated data may still be stored in our database for administrative purposes. Please read the Global Privacy Statement to know more on the Retention policy.

User Restrictions

Users accessing PowerSchool products through their school or school district, who are licensees of the PowerSchool product have the following restrictions:

  1. Modifications of any materials on this Site or use of the materials for any purpose other than as contemplated in this Site is a violation of PowerSchools copyright and proprietary rights.
  2. Unless expressly allowed by the product, you may not reproduce, upload, post, transmit, download, or distribute any part of this site other than printing out or downloading portions of the text and images for your own personal, non-commercial use, without written approval of PowerSchool.
  3. You will not use this Site for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by the ToU.
  4. You agree not to upload, post, transmit, publish, or distribute or use any material or information in this Site that is unlawful, or which may potentially be perceived as being harmful, threatening, or objectionable in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair this Site or interfere with any other partys use and enjoyment of this Site.
  5. You agree not to obtain or attempt to obtain through this Site any materials or information not intentionally made available to you through this Site.

Product Suspension or Termination

PowerSchool reserves the right at any time, and from time to time, to modify or discontinue, suspend, temporarily or permanently, this Site, or any part thereof, with or without notice to the respective school or school district licensing the Site.

Links to Other Sites

This Site may provide links to third party websites or resources. Because PowerSchool does not control such websites and resources, you acknowledge and agree that PowerSchool is not responsible or liable for the content, products or performance of such third party websites and resources, and you hereby irrevocably waive any claim against PowerSchool with respect to such websites and resources. PowerSchool acts as a facilitator in such cases and may not have direct control over the third-party services. PowerSchool reserves the right to remove such third party links within a PowerSchool product at any time without notice. The inclusion of a link to such another website or resource does not necessarily constitute an endorsement of, sponsorship of, or affiliation to PowerSchool of that third-party website or resource, or any products or services provided therein. The information practices of those websites are not covered by this Privacy Statement or any other policies or terms applicable to this Site. We recommend that you review any terms of use and privacy policy of any linked third party website before providing any information to that website or using its products and services. Domain names and trademarks of any linked website, and all content of such linked website, are the sole property of their respective owners. You may elect to explore and register with such third -party sites, choosing to share your personal data directly with such vendors. If you consent to sharing your data with such vendors, you acknowledge that PowerSchool is not requiring you to make that decision.

PowerSchool will not be party to any legal proceedings between a User and a party contracted through the site. In case PowerSchool is implicated in any legal proceedings, costs will be recovered from the party that names PowerSchool. PowerSchool, however, will abide with any court order served on it through due process.

Please note that this Site may also provide links to other sites (whether PowerSchool products, or third parties sites) brought to you by the applicable school or school district. The Terms of Use for our publicly accessible PowerSchool products will vary.

Limitation of Liability

This Site is only a venue. You assume all risks associated with dealing with other Users with whom you come in contact through the site and in no event shall PowerSchool be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, punitive or exemplary damages, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use or data, or other intangible losses, fines, fees, penalties, or liabilities (even if advised of the possibility of such damages), resulting from: (i) the loss of data and/or the use or delay or the inability to use this Site; (ii) the cost of procurement of substitute goods and services resulting from any goods, data, information or services purchased or obtained or messages received or transactions entered into through or from this Site; (iii) unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data; (iv) statements or conduct of any third party on this Site; (v) for any information, software, products, and services obtained through this Site, or otherwise arising out of the use of this Site, whether based on contract, tort, strict liability, or otherwise, even if any of PowerSchool, our affiliates, and/or our respective suppliers and licensors has been advised of the possibility of such damages. (vi) or relating in any way to third-party links accessed through this Site; or (vii) any other matter relating to this Site.

As user authentication on the Internet is difficult, PowerSchool cannot and does not confirm that each user is who they claim to be. Because PowerSchool does not and cannot be involved in user-to-user dealings or control the behavior of participants on the site, in the event that you have a dispute with one or more users, you release PowerSchool (and our agents and employees) from claims, demands and damages (actual and consequential, direct and indirect) of every kind and nature, known and unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed and undisclosed, arising out of or in any way connected with such disputes.

If you are a California resident, you waive California Civil Code d1542, which says: “A general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or suspect to exist in his favor at the time of executing the release, which if known by him must have materially affected his settlement with the debtor.”

PowerSchool is under no legal obligation to, and generally does not, control the information provided by other users which is made available through this site. By its very nature, other people’s information may be offensive, harmful, or inaccurate, and in some cases will be mislabeled or deceptively labeled.

PowerSchool expects that you will use caution and common sense when using this Site. You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for the form, content and accuracy of any information placed by you on this Site.

SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES OR THE LIMITATION OR EXCLUSION OF LIABILITY FOR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES. ACCORDINGLY, SOME OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS OF THE ABOVE MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. IN NO EVENT WILL THE AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF POWERSCHOOL, OUR AFFILIATES, AND OUR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS AND LICENSORS FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO ANY DEFAULT HEREUNDER, REGARDLESS OF THE FORM OF THE ACTION, EXCEED THE AMOUNT OF FEES ACTUALLY PAID BY YOU FOR USE OF THIS SITE.

B. GENERALLY APPLICABLE SECTIONS

This section is applicable to all Users, whether viewing our PowerSchool public website or accessing any PowerSchool product(s).

Prohibited Actions

By your use of the Site, you agree that you will NOT: reverse engineer, duplicate, publish, modify, extract data using automated processes such as bots and webcrawlers (scraping), or otherwise distribute the materials on this Site unless specifically authorized in writing by PowerSchool to do so.

Copyright and Trademark Notices

The entire content of this Site and any supporting software are the proprietary property of PowerSchool and/or its licensors and are protected by U.S. and international copyright and other intellectual property laws. The reproduction, redistribution, modification or publication of any part of this Site without the express written consent of PowerSchool and/or its licensors is strictly prohibited.

You agree not to display, disparage, dilute, or taint our trademarks or use any confusing similar marks or use our trademarks in such a way that would misrepresent the ownership of such marks. Any permitted use of our trademarks by you shall be to the benefit of PowerSchool.

Any suggestions received through contact us shall become the property of PowerSchool without any obligation, and you shall not be entitled to any claim or compensation under any circumstances.

Disclaimer of Warranties

YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT:

YOUR USE OF THIS SITE IS AT YOUR OWN RISK. THIS SITE IS PROVIDED ON AN AS IS AND AS AVAILABLE BASIS. To be effective, the Notice must include the following:
